title: All the Backlist! July 15, 2022
description:
This week, Tirzah recommends two of her favorite memoirs read in 2021!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
BOOKS MENTIONED:
Somebody’s Daughter by Ashley C. Ford
The Natural Mother of the Child by Krys Malcolm Belc
